title: Commentary: Trump’s unpredictable approach to Iran could seriously backfire
description: <![CDATA[ The US president's ambiguity creates problems for deterrence, says this professor of international relations. ]]>
content:
UNPREDICTABILITY AND UNCERTAINTY 
But current US foreign policy on Iran is more than bad deterrence. Trumps vague rhetoric and his refusal to commit reflects his long-standing strategy of being unre… [+1557 chars]
